pages.text: O-Horses' manes and tails can be changed with Mane or Tail Scissors. When 'cut', their manes and tails simply switch through the different types. This has no cooldown.
Mane Types: $(br)Roached (Default), Button Braids, Short, Long, None. $(br2)Tail Types: $(br)Natural (Default), Short, Long, Tucked, Tied.
The $(l)Mane Scissors$() are used to cycle through the mane types on O-Horses.
The $(l)Tail Scissors$() are used to cycle through the tail types on O-Horses.
